channel.title: Can someone help me? Beginner here!
channel.description:
[b][font=Verdana]Heres what iv done-[/font][/b] Make a no-ip, created a server, downloaded moparscape 3.2, and downloaded a program kinda like winrar (can extract files, and I think thats all we need), and downloaded a allstarscape source.
[b]Here is my problem-[/b] When I log on my server its still a hybirdscape source and I dont know how to add my allstarscape source, My other problem is that I cant put the server online so everyone can use it, only I can.
[b]I need a guide to help me with-[/b] Making my server online for everyone to play, Make my source change to what I want it to be.
[b]P.S[/b] please be nice, its my first server, and iv enjoyed playing other players server long enought. I also hae already went so far thats there is no turning back so please help me. Also can you be nice? Please dont flame me or tell me I shouldnt make a server, Only put guides or step by step information. Otherwise the rest is just SPAM to me.

item.title: Can someone help me? Beginner here!
item.dc:creator: @d4rklordpkz d4rklordpkz
item.description:
@d4rklordpkz wrote:

om i dont know were to find that file java.clinet plz somone tell me steps to get there am already tire of this thing plz am not insulting noone amd just mad at my self plz help were can i find client java i searched in server source i cant find it plz help meee

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me? Beginner here!

item.title: Can someone help me? Beginner here!
item.dc:creator: @0_W_N_3_D2 0 W N 3 D
item.description:
@0_W_N_3_D2 wrote:

Did u extract allstarscape? if yes then click runserver and ur source is up. turn on your no-ip host.To edit u might want to see wat u wana edit then it wud be better if u visit ur source. After uve done that then go to client.java file and hit ctrl+f then put the stuff u wana edit like “Server owner is Mod Allstar”. u can change that and put ur name in… After all your editing u might wana compile it so that the changes take place. Go to your source files and look for a compiler or compile batch file. Click it and follow the instructions given like press c for compiling. ull need JDK 6.6-10 for the compiler to work. Now u have to set ur environmental variables, U can look them up from server tutorials its the first stickied topic in server tutorials section. I hope this helped u…

P.S: Allstarscape is silab, im sure u know wat tht means. :rolleyes:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2008, 10:20:53 am[/size][hr]hope this helped…

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone help me? Beginner here!
